pros: High pay, great benefits, a great group of people to work with!
cons: There are no cons to report

job_title: Medical Technologist II in Malone, NY
pros: Good Benefits Workload Reasonable Management is very supportive
cons: Co-workers making drama all the time Union workers have so much power

pros: Offers a full benefit package including 401k, quick and efficient hiring process, onsite full service cafeteria available to employees, no need to leave for lunch as outside options are limited.
cons: The pay is below the state average for respective positions, location of facility is very remote, there is very little to do in Malone New York.

pros: The direct care staff are hardworking caring individuals. This includes those that work as support staff as well as the patient care staff.
cons: The management team are cold uncaring people. They don't care about the staff that provide the backbone the hospital runs upon. There is no loyalty to them. They believe everyone that works there is lucky to have a job. There are plenty of other opportunities out there that people should look into.

pros: Some line staff actually care. Good place to work in the region if you don't want to work in a prison.
cons: Leadership is very poor, nobody ever stays, nursing home staff treated terribly, job security is non existent, employees are not appreciated. Find somewhere else to work!
